body:
Hai guise!!!

i just finished my first play through of the game Dishonored on steam. I made all the bad choices so the end was really gross and the little girl started to scare me and while I was playing it I was just shaking at how gruesome and horrible I had made this world by killing so many people. It was a very unpleasant experience buuuuuut the game is awesome and it's the best game I've ever played and I want to know, if any avicus players have played it, and what the ending is like if you made all the good choices.

Thanks!
~higger

title: Dishonored

replies.body: I realize posting this at 3 in The morning may not have been the best idea if I want a response about something specific...
